issues.description: In solution_repository/assignment/fix_vec_sub.asm, the symbol fix_vec_sub_asm is declared with an extern directive instead of global, which conflicts with the template (where it is exported with global). This visibility mismatch can prevent correct linking of the studentâ€™s implementation and confuse students about how to export their routine.
issues.suggested_fix: Replace the extern directive with a global directive in the solution file. Change `extern fix_vec_sub_asm` to `global fix_vec_sub_asm` so it matches the template and properly exports the symbol.
